com.mopius.nearspeaklibrary

Class NearSpeakManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopius.nearspeaklibrary.NearSpeakManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWSRLoginUserListener, IWSRShowTagListener

    public class NearSpeakManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWSRShowTagListener, IWSRLoginUserListener
    This is the main controller/manager from the nearspeak library. Instantiate this in your main activity.

      • NearSpeakManager

        public NearSpeakManager(android.content.Context _context,
                NearSpeakOperationsListener _listener,
                boolean _startBeaconScan)
        This is the main controller/manager from the nearspeak library. Instantiate this in your main activity.
        Parameters:
        _context - Context of the application
        _listener - Add a listener to receive nearspeak tags
        _startBeaconScan - Choose if bluetooth le aka beacon scanning should start right away
